body.text:
The Hyderabad Information Technology and Engineering Consultancy City, abbreviated as HITEC City, is an Indian Information Technology, Engineering, Health informatics, and Bio-informatics, business district located in Hyderabad, India. HITEC City is spread across 200 acres of land under suburbs of Madhapur, Gachibowli, Kondapur, Manikonda and Nanakramguda, the technology township, also known as Cyberabad. The area comprises of IT parks such as L&T Infocity, Hitech City 2 SEZ, Mindspace Cyberabad SEZ, DLF IT SEZ, Tech Mahindra IT SEZ, TCS Synergy park IT SEZ, SEZs of Infosys, Wipro and APIIC, built to suit campuses of several major technology companies.

Located bang in the midst of all these like minded companies, will be the new landmark of Hitec Hyderabad, Jain Sadguru Imageâ€™s Capital Park. Comprising of Grade â€˜Aâ€™ 11 floors impeccable architecture and 4 level basement parking, 850,000 square feet with super built up retail and commercial space, Jain Sadguru Imageâ€™s Capital Park will be your new address of s

body.text:
The Hyderabad Information Technology and Engineering Consultancy City, abbreviated as HITEC City, is an Indian Information Technology, Engineering, Health informatics, and Bio-informatics, business district located in Hyderabad, India. HITEC City is spread across 200 acres of land under suburbs of Madhapur, Gachibowli, Kondapur, Manikonda and Nanakramguda, the technology township, also known as Cyberabad. The area comprises of IT parks such as L&T Infocity, Hitech City 2 SEZ, Mindspace Cyberabad SEZ, DLF IT SEZ, Tech Mahindra IT SEZ, TCS Synergy park IT SEZ, SEZs of Infosys, Wipro and APIIC, built to suit campuses of several major technology companies.

Located bang in the midst of all these like minded companies, will be the new land{{1}}{{2}}{{3}}

extras.body:
The Hyderabad Information Technology and Engineering Consultancy City, abbreviated as HITEC City, is an Indian Information Technology, Engineering, Health informatics, and Bio-informatics, business district located in Hyderabad, India. HITEC City is spread across 200 acres of land under suburbs of Madhapur, Gachibowli, Kondapur, Manikonda and Nanakramguda, the technology township, also known as Cyberabad. The area comprises of IT parks such as L&T Infocity, Hitech City 2 SEZ, Mindspace Cyberabad SEZ, DLF IT SEZ, Tech Mahindra IT SEZ, TCS Synergy park IT SEZ, SEZs of Infosys, Wipro and APIIC, built to suit campuses of several major technology companies.

rows.desc: For braking, the 42 FJ is fited with a 320 mm front disc and a rear disc brake, supported by dual-channel ABS as standard. This combination of features aims to deliver reliable stopping power and improved safety.  Colour Options and PricingThe Jawa 42 FJ is available in a range of colours, including Deep Black Matte Red Clad, Deep Black Matte Black Clad, Cosmo Blue Matte, Mystique Copper, Aurora Green Matte, and Aurora Green Matte Spoke options. Prices for the model range from Rs 1.99 lakh to Rs 2.20 lakh (ex-showroom), depending on the chosen colour and wheel options.For braking, the 42 FJ is fitted with a 320 mm front disc and a rear disc brake, supported by dual-channel ABS as standard. This combination of features aims to deliver reliable stopping power and improved safety. body.text:
Enhance your business on WhatsApp by leveraging the WhatsApp Business API platform, streamlining marketing, sales, service, and support through automated processes. Send a WhatsApp broadcast to the full audience.With a single click, you can send event invitations, discount vouchers, promotional messages, and customer feedback surveys. The use of SMS (or text message) marketing allows businesses to communicate directly with their customers. Using Firstpass Engage, you can create your ideal text marketing experience on the channels your customers use: SMS, MMS, WhatsApp, Chatbot. The use of SMS (or text message) marketing allows businesses to communicate directly with their customers. Using Firstpass Engage, you can create your ideal text marketing experience on the channels your customers use: SMS, MMS, WhatsApp, Chatbot.
